Summary: The 3 West Club offers a central location near Rockefeller Center and St. Patrick's Cathedral, with rooms that include amenities like flat-panel TVs and digital cable. Some rooms have multiple beds and pull-out couches, accommodating groups or families.

Hotel 414 is a small hotel in a central location near the theater district and Restaurant Row, with free Wi-Fi, a computer in the lobby, and a continental breakfast. It offers a mix of basic amenities, clean rooms, and a helpful staff, although some rooms may be small and lack storage space.

60 Thompson is located in SoHo, near shopping, dining, and subway stations, with rooms that have a loft feel and come equipped with DVD players, CD stereos, and laptop connections. Select rooms were found to be a good size for NYC and the hotel provides free wireless internet.
6 Columbus is in a great location across from the Time Warner Center and close to Central Park and the subway. Some rooms have desks but they are small, and there is no business center.

70 Park Avenue Hotel is well-located near Grand Central Station and major attractions, with amenities such as free WiFi, newspapers, and evening wine receptions. The hotel offers cozy and modern rooms with comfortable beds, suitable for both work and relaxation.

The Ace Hotel has free internet, breakfast, and a location convenient to subway and Penn Station; rooms feature work desks, comfortable beds, and unique decor, though some rooms can be small and noisy. It's located near Midtown attractions, but also has a lively lobby scene and bar.

The Affinia 50 is described as suitable for families, couples and business travelers, offering larger-than-usual rooms, suites with kitchens, and comfortable beds. It provides amenities such as a fitness center, a business center, and a club room with coffee and tea, all in a central Midtown location close to subway lines.

The Affinia Dumont is a tall hotel with spacious rooms, full-size kitchens, a large desk, and a gym, all of which cater to both business and leisure travelers. It is located near restaurants and a subway, providing convenient access to various destinations in New York.

Affinia Gardens offers spacious rooms with full kitchens, making it suitable for extended stays, families, and both business and leisure travelers. The hotel is located on the Upper East Side, near Central Park, museums, and transportation, providing a quiet yet convenient location for exploring the city.

The Affinia Manhattan has a business center, a restaurant, and helpful concierge services and is conveniently located across from Penn Station. Select rooms include a kitchenette, and it is also located near major attractions, including Times Square, Macy's, and the Empire State Building.

The Affinia Shelburne is centrally located near Grand Central Station and Midtown corporations, with spacious rooms, a rooftop bar, and a restaurant, making it suitable for both business and leisure. Some rooms include kitchenettes, and suites are available with separate living rooms.

AKA United Nations offers spacious, modern apartments with full kitchens, separate lounge areas, and complimentary broadband internet, and is conveniently located near the UN Headquarters and Grand Central Terminal. The hotel provides services like daily housekeeping, breakfast on weekdays, and access to a 24-hour gym.

The Algonquin Hotel is a centrally located boutique hotel with small but well-appointed rooms, suitable for business travel that is not a Westin or Hilton in character. It is close to Times Square and caters to older people, with meeting spaces in the lobby and a lively bar.
Americana Inn is a budget-friendly hotel in midtown Manhattan, near Times Square, with small but clean rooms and shared bathrooms. Some rooms include a TV, air conditioning, and a sink.

Amsterdam Court Hotel is centrally located near Times Square and subway lines, making it convenient for accessing attractions, though rooms are small with limited amenities. Some rooms lack natural light, and the hotel has limited business-related facilities.

The Astor on the Park is a basic, clean hotel near Central Park and subway lines, making it convenient for accessing Manhattan. The hotel is often described as small, and having thin walls, and the heating system can be noisy.

The Hotel Bedford is in an excellent midtown Manhattan location, near Grand Central Station, making it convenient to the subway and many attractions. The hotel offers spacious rooms, some with kitchenettes, and is close to restaurants and delis.

The Beekman Tower Hotel offers spacious suites with kitchens and is located near the UN, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers. Some reviewers note the hotel's proximity to public transportation and various attractions.

The Belleclaire Hotel is located on the Upper West Side, close to Central Park and subway lines, and offers a small business center and internet stations. Some reviewers found the hotel suitable for private trips, while others noted it was convenient for seeing colleagues.

The Bentley Hotel offers spacious, clean rooms with modern decor, comfortable beds, and views of the East River and Queensboro Bridge, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers; it includes amenities such as a flat-screen TV, in-room safe, and access to a rooftop bar. The hotel is situated in the Upper East Side, a quieter residential area that is within walking distance to shopping, restaurants, and some attractions, with convenient bus and taxi services available.

The Best Western Bowery Hanbee is praised for its convenient location near Chinatown and Little Italy, with easy access to subway lines for reaching various parts of Manhattan. It offers amenities such as free internet, a business center, and a complimentary breakfast, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers.

The Best Western Convention Center Hotel is conveniently located near the Javits Convention Center, making it ideal for business travelers. It is also within walking distance of Times Square and other attractions, making it suitable for leisure travelers who don't mind walking.

Best Western Hospitality House is an apartment-style hotel with spacious rooms including full kitchens, living rooms, and separate bedrooms, suitable for families and groups. The hotel's central Midtown East location provides convenient access to major attractions, subway lines, restaurants, and businesses.

The Best Western Seaport Inn is located in downtown Manhattan, near the Financial District and South Street Seaport, with subway and ferry access for sightseeing. It offers free wireless internet, a continental breakfast, and proximity to businesses, restaurants, and tourist attractions.

The Blue Moon Hotel is a small, quiet, and clean boutique hotel with large rooms, wireless internet, and flat-screen TVs. It is located in the Lower East Side, near subways and walkable to different areas, with a mix of historic charm and modern amenities.

Broadway Plaza Hotel is a basic, clean, and affordable option in Manhattan with large rooms, complimentary breakfast, and helpful staff. It's centrally located near subway lines and within walking distance of major attractions, though the immediate neighborhood is described as a garment district and can be quiet or "dodgy" at night.

The Buckingham Hotel offers apartment-style rooms with kitchens, making it suitable for longer stays. It features a business center, a second-floor lounge with free Wi-Fi, and is conveniently located near Carnegie Hall and Central Park.

Candlewood Suites Times Square is a new hotel with suites that include a full-size refrigerator, microwave, coffee machine, and free wireless internet, and it is located within walking distance of Times Square and Penn Station. The hotel also offers DIY laundry facilities and a gym.

The Carlton Arms is an old, budget-friendly hotel known for its unique, artist-decorated rooms. It is located near subway stops and various restaurants, but lacks amenities like TVs and may have issues with noise and cleanliness.

The Carvi Hotel has clean rooms, comfortable beds, individual temperature controls, marble bathrooms, and flat-screen TVs, but limited amenities. The hotel is near subway lines, though a bit of a walk from Broadway theaters, and the lobby bar was under construction at the time of one review.

The Casablanca Hotel is near Times Square with free WiFi, a lounge for snacks, and computer/printer access. It is recommended for business or pleasure with clean, functional rooms and a decent cable TV package.

The Chambers Hotel is a modern, stylish boutique hotel in a central location near Fifth Avenue and Central Park. It offers amenities such as a desk area, DVD player, and high-speed internet, with some rooms featuring a separate tub and living area.

Chelsea Lodge is a budget-friendly guesthouse in the Chelsea area of Manhattan, near subway stations and local restaurants, offering clean, small rooms with showers and shared toilets. Some rooms have a desk, and wireless internet is available.

Chelsea Pines Inn is a moderately priced inn on West 14th Street that includes WiFi and breakfast, and offers a business center with computers and printers. It is near the L train, making transfers uptown at Union Square easy and convenient for business travelers.

The Chelsea Savoy is a no-frills but nice hotel with a friendly staff and small rooms that are well air-conditioned, making it a convenient place to sleep for business trips. It is located a block away from the metro with good restaurants and a movie theatre nearby.

City Club Hotel is centrally located near Times Square and Grand Central, with amenities like free internet, comfortable beds, and room service from DB Bistro Moderne, but rooms can be small and dark. Some reviewers mention the hotel being suitable for business trips due to its location and amenities, while others appreciate its style and proximity to attractions for leisure.

The Solita Soho is a small, modern hotel with small rooms, flat-screen TVs, and free internet access, located in close proximity to Chinatown, Little Italy, and Soho. It is near subway access and offers a location downtown for business and leisure travelers.

Club Quarters Downtown is situated in the Financial District, near Wall Street and subway lines, and features small but clean rooms with amenities like free Wi-Fi and bottled water. Some reviewers suggest it's better suited for business travelers due to its location and limited weekend activity, while others found it convenient for exploring the city.

Club Quarters Midtown is in an excellent location, near Times Square, Grand Central, and 5th Avenue, with free WIFI and computer/printer access. Rooms are small, but clean and modern, and the hotel caters to business travelers with desks and workspaces in the rooms.

Club Quarters Rockefeller Center is conveniently located near attractions like Rockefeller Center and Fifth Avenue, with rooms featuring workspaces and internet access. The hotel offers a terrace dining room, fitness room, and efficient service, but rooms can be small and lack certain amenities.
The hotel has free wifi, a business center, and is centrally located near public transportation. Some rooms include a desk and there is a minimum charge to use the computer and printer.

The Comfort Inn Manhattan is centrally located near the Empire State Building and Macy's, with subway access and a business center, and offers free breakfast. Rooms are generally clean but can be small, with some noise from street traffic.

Comfort Inn Manhattan Bridge is a new and clean hotel in Chinatown that offers free WiFi and computers for guest use. The hotel is close to subway stops and within walking distance of Little Italy, South Street Seaport, and the Financial District.

The Comfort Inn Midtown is conveniently located near Times Square and offers free wireless internet, a business center, and a fitness center. Rooms include a desk, iron, ironing board, and coffee maker, catering to business travelers while its proximity to attractions suits leisure travelers.

The hotel offers free high-speed Wi-Fi throughout, a computer with internet and printer in the lobby, and is located in the heart of the theater district, right off Times Square. It is close to restaurants, theaters, subways, and transportation hubs like the Port Authority Bus Terminal and Penn Station.

The hotel offers free high-speed internet, a continental breakfast, and is located within walking distance of Times Square and Penn Station. Some rooms have a view of the city and the Empire State Building.

The Comfort Inn Times Square is a budget-friendly hotel close to Times Square, subways, and the Port Authority bus station, with amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a continental breakfast, and a business-friendly environment. Rooms are small but clean, modern, and equipped with flat-screen TVs and comfortable beds.

The Cooper Square Hotel is conveniently located near the subway, Greenwich Village, and SoHo, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers, with rooms offering city views, free Wi-Fi, and iPod docking stations. Some rooms have desks suitable for business travelers, while access to a fitness center and proximity to restaurants and bars appeal to leisure travelers.

The Cosmopolitan Hotel is located in Tribeca, a short walk from Wall Street, and offers clean and comfortable rooms at reasonable prices; it is conveniently located near subway lines for easy access to the rest of Manhattan. The hotel is also suitable for low-key leisure travel, with dining options steps away.

The Courtyard Times Square South is a centrally located hotel with free and reliable internet, a fitness room, a business center, and meeting rooms. It is within walking distance of major Midtown attractions and various subway lines, making it suitable for business and leisure travelers.

The Courtyard Upper East Side is a clean, modern hotel with amenities like wired internet, a gym, and a pool; it is located in a quiet, residential area that is a bit of a distance from the subway, but near bus lines. It is convenient to museums and has a mix of business and family clientele.

The Courtyard Marriott on Fifth Avenue is centrally located near major attractions and transportation hubs, making it convenient for both sightseeing and business travel. The hotel offers free internet access, a business center, and a restaurant, while also being within walking distance to dining and shopping options.

The Courtyard Midtown East is conveniently located near a subway station, making it easily accessible for both business and leisure travelers. It offers spacious and clean rooms, free internet access, and a business center.

The Crosby Street Hotel is located in SoHo, close to subway, bus lines and Broadway. It offers spacious rooms, a restaurant, a bar, a gym, concierge services, and amenities such as in-room breakfast, and well-stocked mini-bar.

Crowne Plaza Times Square is a large, modern hotel with clean rooms and a buzzy bar, perfect for a location near the center of things; with options for Concierge level rooms including comp breakfast, wireless internet, and an executive lounge on the 46th floor. The hotel also has business amenities such as in-room wireless internet, a business center, and desks.

The Da Vinci Hotel is in an excellent midtown location near Columbus Circle and Central Park, with subway access and walking distance to many attractions. It offers clean, basic rooms with free internet access and a light continental breakfast, catering to budget travelers.

The Doubletree Guest Suites Times Square is noted for its spacious suites with separate living areas, kitchenettes, and multiple TVs, catering to both business and leisure travelers. Its location in Times Square provides convenient access to theaters and other attractions.

The Doubletree Hotel Chelsea is a newer, modern, and clean hotel that is conveniently located near Penn Station, Times Square, and other attractions, with a business center and gym available. Rooms are small, and there may be waits for elevators, but the staff is friendly and helpful.

The Doubletree Metropolitan is conveniently located in midtown Manhattan, close to major bank headquarters and the 51st St. subway station, making it suitable for business travel. With comfortable rooms and walking distance to attractions like Central Park and Times Square, it also appeals to leisure travelers.
The Dream Hotel is in a perfect location for seeing tourist attractions, but rooms are small. Some reviewers recommend this hotel for business trips because of its close proximity to many locations.

The Duane Street Hotel is located in Tribeca, close to subway lines, SoHo, and the Financial District, with rooms featuring modern design, comfortable beds, and amenities like free WiFi and flat-screen TVs. Some reviewers noted the hotel's suitability for business travel and its proximity to various attractions for leisure.

The Dylan Hotel is conveniently located near Grand Central Station, making it accessible for business meetings and transportation. The rooms are of decent size for New York standards, clean, and some offer amenities like iPod docking stations and comfortable beds.

Eastgate Tower is a conveniently located hotel near the UN Headquarters and Grand Central Terminal, offering oversized suites with kitchens and helpful staff, suitable for both business and leisure travelers. The hotel provides rudimentary but adequate services, with nearby restaurants and grocery stores, though lacking an on-site restaurant.

The Econo Lodge Times Square is centrally located near Times Square, Broadway theaters, and subway stations, with free amenities like breakfast and internet access. The rooms are very small, but clean, and the staff is friendly and helpful.

Embassy Suites offers spacious suites, free breakfast, and a manager's reception, suiting both families and business travelers seeking a comfortable stay. The hotel provides a business center with free internet and is near the World Financial Center, catering to business needs while also being close to attractions like Battery Park.

The Empire Hotel is conveniently located near Lincoln Center and Columbus Circle, with access to subways, and offers free wireless internet, a desk, and a comfortable bed, but some rooms are small. Some business travelers found the rooms lacked functionality and had issues with noise and climate control.

The Envoy Club offers spacious apartment-style accommodations with full kitchens, suitable for extended stays, and is located near the NYU Medical Center. Wi-fi is available, though some reviewers noted inconsistent service.

The hotel is located in the Financial District near Wall Street and the South Street Seaport, with subway access to uptown. Rooms are large for NYC standards, with a fridge, microwave, plasma TVs, and a seating area; a buffet breakfast is included.

The Excelsior Hotel is located on the Upper West Side, near Central Park and a subway stop for easy access around the city, and some rooms include desks; Wireless internet is available for a fee. The hotel has meeting rooms available, but does not have many on-site amenities.

The Fairfield Inn offers free internet, a business center in the lobby, and is conveniently located near the subway, making it suitable for business trips. The hotel is also close to Times Square and other attractions, making it a good option for leisure travelers.

The Fitzpatrick Grand Central is located near Grand Central Station, making it accessible to midtown and Westchester/Connecticut trains. It is within walking distance of many NYC attractions and offers large rooms and bathrooms.

The Fitzpatrick Manhattan offers suites suitable for business travelers with separate living areas, kitchenettes, and amenities like flat-screen TVs and internet access. Some found the location convenient for both business meetings on the upper east side and access to shopping and the theater district.

Flatotel is located in midtown and within walking distance to the east side, Rockefeller Center, Time Square, and Central Park, and offers free internet in the business center and WiFi in the room. The hotel offers rooms with a kitchen, and longer stays allow guests to bring food and beverages, making it a great value overall.

Four Points by Sheraton Manhattan Chelsea is centrally located with subway access and close to Union Square, Chelsea, and Times Square. The hotel offers free wired internet, comfortable beds, and a functional room layout.

Four Points SoHo is a modern, clean hotel with small but well-appointed rooms, free Wi-Fi, and a location near subway lines and various neighborhoods. It offers amenities like a business center, gym, and bar, making it suitable for both business and leisure travel.

The Four Points Times Square is a new, clean hotel with comfortable beds, free WiFi, and a business center, located close to Times Square and public transportation. Rooms are small, and the hotel is in a less desirable location with adult stores and construction nearby.

The Four Seasons New York is noted for its large, comfortable rooms, cleanliness, and impeccable service, with amenities such as fax/copier machines and well-equipped fitness centers. The hotel caters to corporate people, with a sophisticated ambiance, and is also family-friendly.

Gild Hall is a boutique hotel in the Financial District, close to subway lines, making it convenient to access other parts of Manhattan. It is quiet at night and has amenities such as internet, a business center, and mini-gyms, but also is within walking distance of tourist attractions and dining.

The Gramercy Park Hotel is located in a quiet area near Gramercy Park and Union Square, close to public transportation and restaurants. It offers free internet/wireless in rooms, a business center, and comfortable beds but has few and inconvenient power outlets.

The Grand Hyatt is a large hotel connected to Grand Central Station, making it easily accessible via subway, and is within walking distance of many midtown attractions. It is soul-less and business-focused, but has a good fitness center and meeting/conference rooms.

The Greenwich Hotel has a gym, spa, Japanese-style pool, courtyard, and guest-only lounge, and offers free internet and a complimentary minibar with non-alcoholic drinks. Some found the hotel conducive to business meetings, while others were kept awake by restaurant noise.

The Hampton Inn Empire State Building is centrally located near Penn Station, Times Square, and Macy's, with access to a subway station, a business center, and free WiFi. The hotel offers a complimentary breakfast, a fitness center, and comfortable rooms with flat-screen TVs.
The Hampton Inn Madison Square Garden is in a central location near Penn Station, Times Square, and other attractions. It offers free Wi-Fi, a business center, and a complimentary breakfast.

Hampton Inn Chelsea is suitable for business and leisure travelers due to its proximity to mellow bars, a movie theatre, and various NYC clients. It offers amenities appreciated by business travelers like breakfast, a business center, and free high-speed internet.

Hampton Inn Soho is a good value with a convenient location for subways, restaurants, and shopping, and offers amenities such as free wifi and a business center. The hotel may be noisy due to traffic and thin walls, and rooms are small, which might make it less suitable for business travelers.

The hotel offers free in-room internet access, a business center with computer terminals and printers, and a free buffet breakfast. Some reviewers stayed at the hotel for business trips, finding it efficient and convenient, while others enjoyed its proximity to Times Square and other attractions for leisure.

The Hampton Inn Seaport/Financial District is a smaller, modern hotel in lower Manhattan, near the Brooklyn Bridge and South Street Seaport, with clean rooms, comfortable beds, and friendly staff. It offers amenities like free breakfast, free internet, and proximity to Wall Street and subway lines, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers.

The Helmsley Middletowne Hotel offers large rooms with amenities such as refrigerators, desks, and sitting areas, with some suites including kitchenettes and multiple TVs. The hotel is located in midtown Manhattan, within walking distance of major attractions and close to public transportation.

The Hilton Club is located in midtown, close to Rockefeller Center and Times Square, with access to a gym and business center. Some rooms include complimentary breakfast, wireless access, and a cocktail reception.

Hilton Garden Inn Chelsea is a new, clean hotel with free wireless and wired internet, a business center, and a fitness center, located close to Penn Station and subway lines. The hotel offers comfortable rooms with a microwave, refrigerator, and flat-screen TV, but has limited restaurant services and a small lobby.

The Hilton Garden Inn on 35th Street is strategically located in Midtown Manhattan, near a subway station, Penn Station, Macy's, and the Empire State Building. It offers amenities such as free WiFi, a business center, and comfortable rooms with HD TVs, microwaves, and coffee makers.

Hilton Garden Inn Times Square is a well-located hotel with clean, decent-sized rooms for NYC, free wireless, and a free business center, making it suitable for business trips. The hotel's location near Times Square, subways, restaurants, and theaters also makes it appropriate for leisure travel.

The Hilton Garden Inn Tribeca is conveniently located near the subway, Chinatown, and Soho, with comfortable rooms that include a desk, free internet, microwave, and refrigerator. It offers business center, fitness center, and is near many restaurants.
The Hilton New York is a large, modern, and efficiently run hotel with nearly 2000 rooms. It is in a central location close to many sights and has a new gym and a business center.

The Hilton Times Square is well-situated near Times Square and subway lines, with clean, spacious rooms starting on the 23rd floor, offering amenities such as a desk, writing chair, and high-speed internet. Some reviewers noted the gym was decent, and the front desk, bell captain, and concierge staff were friendly and professional.

The Holiday Inn Express 5th Avenue is in a central location near major attractions and transportation, with free internet, breakfast, and a business center. Rooms are small but clean and functional, suitable for short trips.

The Holiday Inn Express Times Square is a new hotel with clean rooms, free internet, and a business center, located a few blocks from Times Square, Penn Station, and Port Authority. It offers a free breakfast and is close to subways, making it convenient for getting around the city.

The Holiday Inn Express Chelsea is in a central location, near Penn Station and subway lines, and offers amenities like free internet, a business center, and a gym. Some reviewers mention that it's good for business travelers, while also noting the proximity to tourist attractions.

The Holiday Inn is in a great downtown location close to Chinatown, Little Italy and multiple subway lines, making it convenient for business and leisure. Rooms have coffee making facilities, full length mirrors, secure doors, and free internet, and the hotel offers a business center.

The Holiday Inn Midtown offers free in-room WiFi and meeting areas, but the business center charges $1 per 4 minutes; it is conveniently located for subway access, Central Park, and the Theater District. The hotel has a rooftop pool (open seasonally), and a gym, but some rooms are small and the bar can be expensive.

The Holiday Inn Manhattan 6th Avenue is in a central location, convenient for subway access and within walking distance of Times Square, Penn Station, and the Empire State Building. It offers amenities such as free internet, a business center, and a gym, and is suitable for short stays.

Hotel 17 is a budget-friendly hotel located near Union Square, close to subway lines, restaurants, and shops, with free internet in some rooms; some rooms have private baths, while others have shared bathrooms. The rooms are small, basic, and clean, and include a sink, TV, and air conditioning, but lack extra amenities like breakfast and may have some noise issues.

Hotel 31 is a budget hotel located in midtown Manhattan, close to attractions and subway, with small rooms and shared bathrooms. Some rooms have a sink, TV, and air conditioning; and the hotel offers amenities like luggage storage and taxi service.

Hotel 373 is a modern, clean, and conveniently located hotel nearby the Empire State Building and public transportation, with free Wi-Fi, flat screen TVs, and iPod docks. Though rooms are small and lack amenities, the location, cleanliness, and comfortable beds make it suitable for short stays.
Hotel 41 is a small, modern hotel that is conveniently located near Times Square and subways. It offers amenities such as free WiFi, a business center, and breakfast.
Hotel 99 offers rooms equipped with writing desks, flat screen TVs, and free Internet access. The hotel is located in the Upper West Side, with subway access to other areas of the city.

The Hotel Beacon is located in a real NYC neighborhood with a subway nearby, and offers suites with kitchenettes, state-of-the-art and huge TVs, and free computer access in a small business center.  The hotel is suitable for both business and leisure travelers due to its proximity to a subway and the convenient in-room kitchenette.

Hotel Chandler is a centrally located Midtown Manhattan hotel with amenities including free Wi-Fi, a gym, a business center, and free coffee/tea. The hotel is near subway lines, the Empire State Building, and Penn Station.

Hotel Deauville is a budget-friendly, basic hotel in Midtown Manhattan, near the subway and within walking distance of attractions like the Empire State Building, and offers free WiFi. Some rooms include kitchenettes with refrigerators and burners, and the hotel provides a business center with free internet access.

East Houston Hotel is a clean, modern hotel located close to subway stations and within walking distance of multiple neighborhoods such as Soho and Little Italy; it offers free Wi-Fi, a rooftop terrace, and a complimentary breakfast. The rooms are small and have limited storage space, with semi-transparent bathroom walls that may not be suitable for all travelers.

Hotel Elysee is a small, European-style hotel in midtown Manhattan, with a great location close to shopping, museums, and transportation, as well as free wifi and a business center. It offers a complimentary breakfast, an afternoon wine and cheese soiree, and rooms with a separate dressing room.

The Gansevoort Hotel in NYC offers a trendy, modern hotel with a gym, new restaurant, and easy access to restaurants, bars, subway routes and the Meatpacking District. Rooms have comfortable beds, robes, slippers, and free wireless internet.

Hotel Giraffe is a boutique hotel in a convenient location with high-speed internet, continental breakfast, and evening wine and cheese, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers. The hotel is noted for having comfortable rooms with modern amenities, and friendly and helpful staff.

Hotel Grand Union is conveniently located near transportation and landmarks, with clean rooms, and offers amenities like free WiFi, a fridge, and internet access in the lobby. Some rooms have desks, and the hotel is suitable for those who plan to spend most of their time sightseeing.

Hotel Indigo - NYC is in close proximity to the Javits center, Times Square, Herald Square, and three subway lines, with rooms that have a desk for working, free hi-speed internet, and a comfortable bed. The hotel restaurant, Blu, is considered the best in the area, but there is no coffee maker in the rooms.

Hotel Mela is a clean, modern, small boutique hotel with comfortable beds and a convenient location near Times Square that offers free wifi; some rooms have a desk/chair and some have movie and gym access. Certain reviewers note it is best for short business trips or couples getaways, or for business travelers needing to stay near Times Square and within walking distance of the train station.

Hotel Metro is a clean, reasonably priced Midtown hotel with a helpful staff, free Wi-Fi, and a gym. It offers a continental breakfast and is located near Penn Station, Herald Square, Macy's, and the Empire State Building.

Hotel Newton is a budget-friendly hotel located on the Upper West Side near the subway, making it easy to access all of Manhattan; some rooms include a fridge, microwave, and work desk, although rooms may be small and older. Some reviewers noted the friendly staff and proximity to transportation, shops, and food, while others reported small rooms and dated decor.

The Hotel on Rivington has free wifi, work spaces are absent from rooms, the gym is small and dark, and the lounge/restaurant is spacious and comfortable, getting busy and loud at night but mellow during the day. Business travelers may also want to note breakfast is included and there are electrical outlets available near desks, although the lighting design is confusing.

Hotel Reserve is located in the Financial District, near subway stations, making it convenient for accessing different parts of the city and is situated near Wall Street, the WTC site, and Century 21. The hotel offers free Wi-Fi and a business center, but some found the immediate area around the hotel quiet on weekends.

The St. James Hotel is in an excellent location, close to Times Square, subways, restaurants, and shopping, with free wifi and locker rentals; some rooms include a good-sized double bed, desk, and closet space, and are clean. Limited amenities cater more to travelers interested in exploring the city rather than spending time at the hotel.

The Stanford is well-situated in Korea Town, close to Macy's and shopping, making it convenient for some downtime, and is near Penn Station and the subway. There are free internet computers on the 2nd level and rooms have a desk and chair.

Hotel Wales is located in the Upper East Side, near Central Park and museums, with wireless internet access, and offers suites with separate sitting areas suitable for work. The hotel has a second-floor lounge with free internet and a printer, and staff may offer deals for weekend stays.

Hudson Hotel is in a central location and is close to subway lines, which is convenient for getting around Manhatten; some rooms have small desks, while there are amenities like a gym and rooftop access. Some reviewers note the small rooms may not be ideal for business travelers needing to work in their rooms.

Ink48 is a new hotel with spacious rooms, stylish design, and city or river views, located a 10-15 minute walk from Times Square and close to the Javits Convention Center. The hotel offers amenities such as complimentary breakfast, evening wine service, and a fitness center, but some facilities like the restaurant and spa were still under construction during the review period.

The Inn New York City is located on the Upper West Side, near Central Park and the 72nd Street subway station, with easy access to midtown. The Inn offers suites with kitchens, multiple rooms, and access to shops and restaurants, blending hotel amenities with the feel of a private residence.

The Intercontinental Barclay is noted for its location close to Grand Central Station, Times Square, and Park Avenue, offering easy access to many sights. Some found it suitable for business travel given business center and room services, while others noted comfortable rooms for leisure.

Jumeirah Essex House is centrally located near Central Park, Columbus Circle, 5th Avenue and Broadway making it convenient for meetings and other mid-town activities. The hotel offers clean and stylish rooms, comfortable workspaces, good beds, and nice shower pressure making it suitable for business and leisure.

The Kitano is suitable for business and leisure travelers, offering excellent service, a convenient location near Grand Central Station, and quiet, clean rooms with soundproof windows. It features amenities such as a jazz bar, Japanese restaurant, and business center.

La Quinta Manhattan is located near Penn Station, subway lines, and major attractions, and offers free internet, a business center, and a fitness center; it is also noted for its cleanliness and helpful staff. The hotel provides rooms with comfortable beds and amenities like a safe and work desk, though some rooms are small and may have limited views.

Lafayette House is a quirky, charming boutique hotel in the East Village, with large rooms that include sitting areas, fireplaces, and kitchenettes. It is located near Washington Square Park, the Children's Museum of Art and a Wholefoods store.

Le Parker Meridien is well-situated near Central Park, has easy subway access, and offers amenities such as a rooftop pool, a gym, meeting spaces, and park view rooms. The hotel has rooms with a work desk, some suites with a separate living room, and is located near Carnegie Hall, shopping, and restaurants.

The Library Hotel is described as a good location for business/leisure travel due to its proximity to Grand Central Station, access to multiple subway lines, and Midtown East location. It offers amenities such as free Wi-Fi, gym passes, and a rooftop bar suitable for business or leisure travelers.

The Loews Regency is noted for its excellent location, proximity to Central Park and shopping on Madison and 5th Avenue. Some found the hotel suitable for business with work spaces in the rooms and fitness center, while others enjoyed it for family stays, pet-friendliness, and large rooms.

The Lowell is a small, intimate hotel located on the Upper East Side, near Central Park and Madison Avenue shopping. Rooms often include kitchenettes, and the hotel offers amenities like a gym, free computer/printer access, and room service from the Post House restaurant, with some suites featuring working fireplaces and terraces.

Mandarin Oriental New York is located near Central Park and midtown, with a business center open all night, making it convenient for both business and leisure. It has great spa facilities and access to the Time Warner Center with food, a bank, and shopping.

The Milford Plaza is conveniently located near Times Square, Broadway shows, restaurants, and transportation, but rooms are small and old. The hotel offers amenities like a business center and gym, but extra charges may apply for internet access and luggage storage.

The Millenium Hilton is a sleek, modern, and comfortable hotel in downtown Manhattan with spacious rooms, a gym, and a pool. It is conveniently located near subway lines for access to other parts of the city, and it offers polite and discrete service aimed primarily at the business traveler.

The Millennium Broadway Hotel is noted for its location near Times Square, which is convenient for accessing shows, restaurants, and transportation. Rooms are spacious and modern, some with views, while amenities cater to both business and leisure needs.

The Millennium UN Plaza Hotel is a good option for business and leisure travelers due to its proximity to the UN, Grand Central station, large rooms, workout facilities, and city views. Some rooms may be outdated, and some guests have reported issues with staff and cleanliness.

The Moderne Hotel is a small, centrally located hotel close to Times Square and Central Park, with rooms that include amenities such as a desk lamp and good WiFi. It offers a coffee and tea service and computer access for a fee.

Morgans Hotel offers a convenient Midtown location near Grand Central Station and various attractions, with amenities such as a gym pass, living room with coffee, and breakfast. The rooms are modern, quiet, and equipped with comfortable beds and iPod docks, though some are small and may lack a desk or table.

Murray Hill East Suites is centrally located near Grand Central Station, making it convenient for accessing various parts of Manhattan. Some rooms include a kitchen and dining area, and while there is no in-room internet access, the lobby offers free WiFi.

Murray Hill Inn is a budget-friendly, European-style hotel in Midtown Manhattan, with small but clean rooms and a helpful staff. It is centrally located near transportation, dining, and major attractions like the Empire State Building.

The Marriott Downtown is conveniently located in the Financial District, close to Wall Street, the WTC site, and subway lines for easy access to other parts of Manhattan. Rooms have work desks, and flat-screen TVs, and the hotel offers business services; the hotel is also near tourist attractions like the Statue of Liberty and Battery Park and provides good views.

The Marriott East Side is conveniently located for business travelers, with functional and clean rooms, and is near meeting places and transportation hubs. It is also well-situated for leisure, within walking distance of attractions like Times Square and Central Park.

The Marriott Marquis is centrally located in Times Square and has spacious rooms, modern amenities, a fitness center, and multiple restaurants, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers. The hotel also has conference facilities, a business center, and easy access to transportation.

The New York Palace is noted for its midtown location, proximity to shopping, efficient service, and the Executive Lounge, offering amenities suitable for business needs.
The hotel also offers leisure facilities like a gym, multiple dining options, and access to nearby attractions like St. Patrick's Cathedral.

The Night Hotel is a trendy, small boutique hotel near Times Square with comfortable beds, plasma TVs, and Bose sound systems. It is conveniently located for both midtown meetings and tourist attractions, with wireless internet access and a nearby gym available for a fee.

The Novotel Times Square is conveniently located near Times Square with a business center and optional wireless internet access. Some rooms have a Times Square view, and the hotel is near subway stations, Broadway theaters, Rockefeller Center, and Central Park.

Off Soho Suites offers apartment-like suites with kitchenettes and multiple rooms, in close proximity to subway lines and several neighborhoods. It's suited for those who want to avoid restaurant food, and is convenient for sightseeing, with some mentions of business travel.

The Omni Berkshire Place is in an excellent location in midtown Manhattan, close to shops, restaurants, and transportation, providing ambience and access to the business district. Some rooms are large and well-appointed, and Select Guest membership includes free wifi and coffee service.
On The Ave Hotel is conveniently located near subway stations and close to both Central Park and Riverside Park. Some rooms have desks, and the hotel has a business center with internet access.
Park 79 is located on the Upper West Side, close to Central Park and subway stations, with free WiFi, and helpful staff. Rooms have amenities like ironing boards and desks.

The Park Central Hotel was described as being old-style with space-lacking rooms that were designed to sleep or socialize out-of-room, with no desk in the room, which is poor design for business travelers. Rooms had ethernet, but it was fee-based.

The Park South Hotel is conveniently located near public transportation, making it a suitable base for exploring Manhattan, and offers amenities such as free internet, a business center, and a complimentary breakfast. It is noted for being clean, having comfortable beds, and offering a functional space, though rooms can be small.

The Peninsula New York is known for its great location on 5th Avenue, close to shopping and Central Park, with rooms featuring comfortable beds, spacious bathrooms, and in-room amenities like complimentary water and bedside control panels. It also offers a rooftop gym, spa, and pool, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers.

The Phillips Club offers studios, one, and two-bedroom apartments with kitchens, catering to both short and long-term stays, with amenities like a gym, proximity to Lincoln Center, and subway access. The hotel is equipped for conferences, with junior suites boasting impressive bathroom facilities, though room service may have occasional delays.

The Plaza Athenee is a smaller, intimate hotel with a residential feel, located on the Upper East Side, close to Central Park and Madison Avenue shops. The hotel offers attentive service, comfortable rooms, and amenities such as a desk, and is within walking distance of museums and restaurants.

The Radisson Martinique on Broadway is in a central location close to Penn Station, Times Square, and the subway. It offers amenities such as free WIFI, a business center, and executive rooms with a lounge that includes breakfast and evening cocktails.
The Ramada Eastside in NYC offers free WiFi, a business center, and free local calls. The hotel is located near transportation and provides a business center with free internet and printing.

The Red Roof Inn Manhattan is noted for its central location near Penn Station, Times Square, and the Empire State Building, and offers amenities such as free WiFi, a workspace in some rooms, and complimentary breakfast. The hotel caters to a wide range of guests, including both tourists and business travelers.

Hotel 57 has a convenient Midtown location near shops and attractions, but its small rooms and minimalist concierge lounge may not be ideal for business travelers needing space or consistent service. Some found the hotel suitable for tourists due to its proximity to attractions and access to nearby dining options.

The Renaissance New York Hotel Times Square is a modern and clean hotel in a central location with amenities such as a gym and business center. It offers various rooms with comfortable beds and great views and is staffed with helpful and courteous employees.

The Residence Inn Times Square is well-located near Times Square, Bryant Park, and Grand Central Station, with spacious rooms that include a kitchen. The hotel offers free internet, a business center, and breakfast, with valet parking available for a fee.

The Ritz-Carlton Battery Park is described as a large, elegantly styled hotel with spacious rooms and comfortable beds, making it suitable for business travelers. While the downtown location is convenient to the financial district, it is also a short subway ride away from the excitement of Times Square/Midtown.

The Rockefeller Center Hotel is noted for its prime midtown location near Rockefeller Center, 5th Avenue, and various attractions, with proximity to subway lines; it features modern, clean rooms with amenities like free WiFi, work spaces, and in-room coffee makers. The hotel's business center, efficient check-in/out process, and proximity to corporate locations are also mentioned.

The Roger Smith Hotel is centrally located near Grand Central Terminal, making it convenient for accessing different parts of Manhattan for both business and leisure. It offers amenities like free Wi-Fi, a restaurant and bar, and various room types including suites with kitchenettes, catering to diverse traveler needs.

The Roger Williams Hotel is described as a good boutique hotel that's reasonable and centrally located, far enough away from Times Square but close to good Korean and Indian restaurants. Some reviewers mentioned they have stayed there for both work and personal travel.

Room Mate Grace is a small, clean, and modern hotel located near Times Square and subway stations, with amenities such as free wifi, a business center in the lobby, and an ample continental breakfast. The hotel has a lively pool and bar scene, and some reviewers noted that the rooms are small and best suited for short stays.

The Royalton Hotel is centrally located in Midtown Manhattan, close to Times Square and transportation hubs. It offers comfortable rooms, a trendy lobby with a popular bar, and amenities such as a fitness room and business center.
The Salisbury Hotel has good-sized rooms for an older NYC hotel, a work desk with a comfortable chair, and is close to subway lines and Central Park. Some rooms have microwaves and refrigerators.
The San Carlos Hotel is in a great location and has roomy suites, microwaves, fridges, and a business center with free internet. The hotel has a gym and offers a continental breakfast.

Seafarers International House is a budget-friendly accommodation located near Union Square, offering clean rooms with options for private or shared bathrooms. It provides amenities such as free internet access, and is close to public transportation, restaurants, and shops.

The Sheraton New York Hotel & Towers can accommodate both business and leisure with a gym, quick room service, and internet in the rooms and lobby. However, some found it more suitable for business travelers due to the business-like service and standard rooms.
The Skyline Hotel offers spacious rooms, a pool, a restaurant, and is located within walking distance to Times Square and many attractions. It also offers parking and is near public transportation.

The Smyth Tribeca is a modern hotel with spacious rooms, comfortable beds, and amenities like flat-screen TVs and iPod docking stations, located near subway lines and restaurants. Some reviewers mention suites with sitting areas suitable for business meetings, while others note the lack of a business center.

The Sofitel New York is a well-situated hotel for both business and leisure in Midtown Manhattan, with amenities such as a gym, meeting spaces, and easy access to various tourist attractions. It offers a quiet environment, comfortable rooms, and efficient service, with options for both standard rooms and suites.

Soho Grand Hotel is in a great location close to shopping, restaurants, and subway; some rooms have a view of the city, and the hotel offers business center and meeting facilities. Some reviewers mention they stayed for business and found the location convenient to the financial district.

Soho House is located in the Meatpacking District, near shops and restaurants, and offers amenities such as free internet, a pool table, and a private cinema. One reviewer mentioned staying there for both leisure and business and having good memories of the service.
Stay Hotel is located near Times Square and offers a business center with free internet access in the lobby. The hotel has a bar/restaurant and is close to public transportation and dining options.

The Alex Hotel offers spacious rooms, some with kitchens, and is conveniently located near Grand Central Station, making it suitable for both business and leisure. It provides amenities like free internet in the business center, Frederic Fekkai toiletries, and comfortable beds, though some guests have noted issues with in-room internet access and limited desk space.

The Belvedere Hotel is a centrally located Midtown hotel with amenities including a gym, a business center, high-speed internet, and a microwave, fridge, and coffee maker in each room. It is within walking distance of the Theater District, Times Square, and subway stations.

The Benjamin is a Midtown NYC boutique hotel with spacious suites, a kitchenette, a large desk, reliable internet access, and fax machines making it suitable for business travelers. The hotel also offers a pillow concierge, and is conveniently located to midtown attractions making it suitable for leisure travelers.

The Blakely Hotel offers spacious rooms, comfortable beds, and kitchenettes, appealing to both business and leisure travelers with amenities like free Wi-Fi and a convenient location near attractions and transportation. The hotel's friendly staff and well-appointed rooms create a home-away-from-home atmosphere.
The Bowery Hotel is well-appointed with iPod docks, free wifi, and laptop rentals. It is located in a convenient location near shopping areas and places to eat.

The Bryant Park Hotel is centrally located near transportation, Times Square, and Bryant Park with clean, modern rooms that contain desks and iPod docking stations; Some reviewers note suitability for business as well as proximity to shops and attractions. However, the hotel has limited facilities with no real communal area.

The Carlton Hotel is centrally located near subway lines, Grand Central, Union Square, and the Financial District, making it convenient for transport around the city; wireless internet is available. It lacks in-room coffee makers.

The Carlyle is a traditional, classy hotel with personalized service and a quiet atmosphere, offering a convenient location near museums and high-end boutiques; it's known for its discreet service, making it suitable for business or leisure. Some rooms have desks and comfortable seating areas, and the hotel provides amenities like fresh flowers, newspapers, and attentive staff.
The Franklin Hotel is located on the Upper East Side, near the subway, Central Park, and museums. It offers complimentary breakfast and evening wine and cheese, and has a relaxing environment.

The French Quarters Guest Apartments is Irish owned with connections to local bars in the Times Square area and offers rooms with kitchenettes and comfortable beds. It's located close to Times Square and Restaurant Row.

The Gem Hotel Chelsea offers free Wi-Fi, a business center with computer access, and work areas in the rooms, but some reviewers noted the rooms are small and may not be suitable for business travelers needing more space. The hotel's location in Chelsea provides convenient access to transportation, restaurants, and attractions for leisure travelers.
The hotel offers amenities such as free wireless internet, a desk, and coffee-making facilities. It's located close to Penn Station, Times Square, and Madison Square Garden.

The Gem Soho is located near the subway, several restaurants, and shops, with free Wi-Fi, a refrigerator, and a microwave in each room. Some reviewers found the rooms small but adequate for sleeping and showering after a day out, while others appreciated the comfortable beds and helpful staff.

The Grant Hotel is a budget hotel located on the Upper West Side, close to the subway, with small, clean rooms and shared bathrooms. It offers amenities such as TV, air conditioning, and internet access for a fee.

The Hampton Inn Times Square North is noted for its location near Times Square and its provision of amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a business center, and a free breakfast. Rooms were noted as clean and comfortable with the inclusion of a work desk and a safe.

The Helmsley Carlton House Hotel offers spacious rooms, some with kitchenettes, and is located one block from Central Park, close to shopping, restaurants, and subways, with easy access to Times Square and Museum Mile. Some rooms are newly refurbished, and suites are available, with some offering balconies overlooking Central Park.

The Helmsley Park Lane is in an excellent location for tourists near Central Park and 5th Avenue, and offers amenities such as internet access and spacious rooms that are suitable for business travelers. Some reviewers note the dated decor and worn furnishings.

Herald Square Hotel is noted for its central location near transportation, major attractions, and restaurants, making it a convenient and affordable base for exploring New York City. It offers basic rooms with free Wi-Fi, a work desk, and a coffee machine in the lobby, balancing practicality and value.

Hotel 91 is a clean and modern budget hotel located in the heart of Manhattan's Chinatown, near the Manhattan Bridge and a couple blocks from the East Broadway subway station. Rooms include free ethernet, flat screen TVs, and comfortable beds, but lack amenities such as a refrigerator, while the hotel offers free coffee and tea in the lounge.

The Hotel at Times Square is conveniently located near Times Square, Grand Central, and the subway, with amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a business center, and a fitness room. Some rooms include a desk and iHome system making it suitable for business and leisure.

The Inn at Irving Place may not be suitable for business travelers needing a place to sleep for the evening, but could be a unique escape within the city. The Inn offers amenities such as WiFi and is located in the Gramercy area.

The Iroquois is a small, sophisticated boutique hotel centrally located near Times Square, making it suitable for both business and leisure. It offers amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a fitness center, and a restaurant, with comfortable rooms and helpful staff.

The Jane Hotel offers small, clean rooms with amenities like flatscreen TVs, iPod docks, and free WiFi, and is located near the subway, restaurants, and shops. It features a historic building with a bar, though some areas are still under renovation, and provides a cost-effective option in the West Village.

The Kimberly Hotel offers well-appointed, luxurious rooms geared towards both business and leisure guests, including amenities like iPod docks, coffee makers, refrigerators, microwaves, and work desks. The hotel also provides convenient access to a network of sports facilities in Manhattan through a partnership with the NY Health/Racquet Club.

The Lombardy is a small boutique hotel with large rooms, some of which are studio or one-bedroom apartments with kitchens. It is located in midtown Manhattan, close to restaurants, shopping, and transportation.

The London NYC is conveniently located in Midtown near Central Park, Times Square, and various subway lines, with spacious suites, free WiFi, and a well-equipped gym, making it suitable for both business and leisure. Some suites include a separate living area, a work desk, and blackout curtains.

The Lucerne is a reasonably priced, traditionally decorated hotel on the Upper West Side with small but comfortable rooms, suitable for business and leisure travel. It's located near Central Park, the subway, and various restaurants, and provides free wireless internet.

The Manhattan Club has a business center on the 26th floor with computers and printing, and suites have a desk in the bedroom. The hotel is centrally located near Times Square and Central Park, with subway access.

The Mansfield Hotel is centrally located near Times Square and Grand Central, with updated rooms, free Wi-Fi, and a 24-hour complimentary espresso bar. Some reviewers mention amenities suitable for business travelers, while others highlight the hotel's proximity to tourist attractions and the availability of suites.

The Marcel at Gramercy is described as a modern, comfortable boutique hotel with small rooms, though larger corner rooms are available. It has a business lounge with free internet and coffee, and is conveniently located near subway, buses, restaurants, and attractions in Gramercy Park.

The Maritime Hotel has a convenient Chelsea location near the Meatpacking District and subway, and offers amenities such as free wifi, a business center, and room service from its restaurants. It features small but well-designed rooms with comfortable beds and unique nautical-themed decor.

The Mark is located on the Upper East Side near museums, art galleries, Central Park, and upscale shopping. Some rooms include kitchenettes and the hotel provides services such as concierge, on-call doctors, and car service.

The Marmara Manhattan offers apartment-style rooms with full kitchens, free WiFi, and amenities such as a fax/printer/copier. It is located on the Upper East Side, near subway access to other parts of the city.

The Mave Hotel is well-located in Midtown Manhattan, near subway stops and attractions like Madison Square Park and the Empire State Building. It offers modern decor, clean rooms, and a helpful staff, with amenities such as free Wi-Fi and a grab-and-go breakfast.

The Mercer is located in SoHo, near subway connections and interesting shopping areas. It offers amenities such as spacious rooms, comfortable beds, good service, a lobby bar for hotel guests, and complimentary gym passes.

The Michelangelo Hotel in New York City is noted for its great location near Times Square and other attractions, spacious rooms, quiet atmosphere, and 5-minute complimentary limo service to the financial district, making it suitable for both tourists and business travelers. It offers various room styles and sizes, attentive service, and is close to subway lines and business centers.
The Milburn Hotel has free WiFi, a free computer for guest use, and is in a quiet location away from the touristy areas. Some rooms include kitchenettes, a desk, and a chair.

The Muse Hotel is centrally located near Times Square and the Theater District, making it convenient for both business and leisure activities. It offers free Wi-Fi, wine hour, and is described as a boutique hotel with comfortable rooms.

The New York Helmsley is in an excellent location, close to Grand Central Station, with spacious rooms that contain amenities such as a large TV and free WiFi. The hotel has a gym, and offers services like room service, laundry, and dry cleaning.
The New Yorker Hotel is in a central location close to Penn Station, the subway, Times Square, and the Javits Center. The hotel provides free wireless internet, a business center, and a gym.

Some reviewers found the rooms spacious and comfortable, while others found them small and in need of renovation. The hotel offers amenities such as a desk with free internet, printer, fax, and copier in suites.
The Plaza Hotel is located centrally near Central Park and 5th Avenue. It has amenities such as a conference center, function venue, and modern technology.
The Pod Hotel is conveniently located and reasonably priced, with clean and modern rooms. It is near the subway, restaurants, and tourist attractions and offers free WiFi.

The Premier is a boutique hotel connected to the Millennium Broadway, with modern, serene, and comfortable rooms, as well as a roomy and luxurious bathroom. It offers complimentary breakfast, evening drinks and hors d'oeuvres, and is located close to Times Square and the theater district.

The Ritz-Carlton Central Park is in a prime location near Central Park, shopping, and transportation. It offers a business center, concierge services, and meeting rooms, along with a spa, club lounge, and various dining options.

The Roosevelt Hotel is in a central location, close to Grand Central Station, and has a grand lobby with a busy bar and restaurant, making it a good option for business travelers. Rooms are clean and comfortable, though old and small, but the location is also great for leisure and shopping.

The Sherry-Netherland, located on 5th Avenue near Central Park, offers large suites, some with kitchens, and provides amenities like free WiFi and an exercise room with up-to-date training equipment. It is conveniently located for mid-town meetings, restaurants, shopping, and attractions like Broadway and Rockefeller Center.

The Shoreham Hotel in midtown Manhattan is described as a modern, stylish, and clean boutique hotel with a convenient location for shopping, Central Park, and businesses. It offers amenities like free wifi, a business center, and a 24/7 coffee machine.

The St. Regis is noted for its spacious and quiet guest rooms, functional decor, butler service, and meeting spaces. The hotel also offers amenities such as high-speed internet, 24-hour services, and a central location near shopping and Central Park.

The hotel has free Wifi, a table that can be used as a work space, and is located close to transit options. Some reviewers noted the rooms were small and best for individual travelers or couples, rather than families.

The Surrey Hotel offers large suites with kitchenettes, providing a comfortable stay for families and those needing more space; it is located on the Upper East Side, near Central Park and museums, with easy access to transportation. Some rooms may be dated, and noise from the street can be an issue for some guests.

Sylvan Guest House is located in Harlem, near a grocery store and multiple subway lines, including an express train to Manhattan. The property has multiple rooms, a well-equipped kitchen, a terrace, and a living room.

The Time Hotel is centrally located near Times Square and subway lines, making it convenient for both business and leisure activities, and offers amenities such as in-room internet, fax machines, and workspaces; however, some rooms are small and may be noisy. The hotel has a restaurant, bar, and gym, although some reviewers have noted issues with service, noise, cleanliness, and maintenance.

The Waldorf Astoria is located in midtown Manhattan, close to many sights and sounds of the Big Apple and near subway, buses, and taxis. It is known for hosting meetings and conferences, and offers amenities like a business center.

The Westin Times Square is a modern, centrally-located hotel with spacious rooms, a large desk, and high-speed internet, but the wireless internet is not free; there is also a gym in the hotel. The hotel is located a block from Times Square and convenient to theaters and public transportation.

Hotel Thirty Thirty is centrally located near the Empire State Building, 5th Ave, and Grand Central Station, with amenities such as free hi-speed internet LAN access in superior rooms; suitable for business trips with free breakfast for hotel guests, and convenient for sightseeing. Rooms range from small standard rooms to larger superior rooms.

The Thompson LES offers modern, well-designed rooms with comfortable beds, spacious bathrooms, and city views; some rooms have work desks and flat-screen TVs, and internet access is available for a fee. It is located in the Lower East Side, near subway lines, restaurants, bars, and shops.

Travel Inn is a basic, clean hotel near Times Square and a few blocks from the Javits Convention Center, making it suitable for both tourists and conference attendees. The hotel offers free parking, wireless internet for a fee, and it is near public transportation.

The Tribeca Grand is in a convenient location in Tribeca, within walking distance to Soho, Chinatown and Little Italy and close to subway lines; rooms include desks and wireless internet is available. It has an atrium lobby with a bar that is open late on weekends.

The Trump International Hotel is well-located near Central Park, Columbus Circle, and subway lines, with spacious rooms that include kitchens, and business amenities such as complimentary computers, personalized stationary, and fax machines. The hotel has services that cater to business and leisure travelers such as a gym, pool, spa, and room service.

The Tudor Hotel is conveniently located near the UN and Grand Central Station, making it suitable for business travelers, and offers a location within walking distance to attractions like Times Square for leisure. Some reviewers mention that the hotel has good facilities for both business and leisure.

The Vincci Avalon is centrally located in Manhattan and offers spacious rooms, free WiFi, and a computer room for guest use, making it suitable for both business and leisure travelers. Suites include a separate lounge area that is distinct from the bedrooms.

W The Court is in midtown Manhattan, near Grand Central Station making it convenient to many destinations. Some reviewers found it suitable for business trips, with comfortable rooms and a helpful staff.

The W Tuscany is centrally located near Grand Central Station, making it convenient for both business and leisure travelers. The rooms are spacious, especially by NYC standards, and offer comfortable beds, desks, and modern amenities.

W Times Square is described as a trendy and modern hotel in the heart of Times Square, with state-of-the-art rooms, a nice lobby, and accessibility to public transportation and taxis. The hotel caters to business travelers but is also suitable for leisure, with amenities like iPod docking stations, flat-screen TVs, and work spaces.

W Union Square is a modern hotel with a gym, bar, and restaurant, located near Union Square with easy access to subway lines. Some reviewers mention that the hotel has business amenities like in-room WiFi (for a fee), a business center, and meeting rooms.

The Waldorf Towers is located in midtown Manhattan, near many tourist attractions and with easy access to transportation. Some suites include a living room with an office area and a dining room table.

The Wall Street Inn is a small, quiet hotel in the Financial District, near subway stations, making it accessible to other parts of the city. It offers amenities such as free Wi-Fi, a continental breakfast, and in-room conveniences like ironing boards and safes, with some rooms having work desks.

The Warwick Hotel is in an excellent midtown location, near Central Park, Times Square, and many shops, making it convenient for both business and leisure. There is a free business center and gym and a bar for light food and drinks.

The Washington Jefferson Hotel is well-located near Times Square, Broadway, and subway stations, making it suitable for exploring Midtown Manhattan. Rooms are small, clean, and equipped with amenities like a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi.
Washington Square Hotel is in a great location with close proximity to Greenwich Village, NYU, and subway. Some rooms are small, but clean, and breakfast is included.
The Wellington Hotel has a central location, with a subway entrance outside the door, but rooms are small and outdated. The hotel is close to Central Park and Times Square.

The Hilton Grand Vacation Club West 57th Street is a new, modern property in midtown Manhattan, near Central Park and the Theater District, with studio apartment-style rooms, a fitness center, and an owners lounge with complimentary breakfast and evening snacks. The hotel offers amenities such as free high-speed internet, a desk area, and a television with a wide variety of channels.

The Wingate Inn Manhattan Midtown is a smaller, clean, and modern hotel, equipped with free high-speed internet, a business center, a gym, and comfortable desks/chairs; It is close to Penn Station making it ideal for travelers needing train access.

The Wolcott Hotel is a budget-friendly option with a central location near the Empire State Building and Times Square. It offers basic amenities, clean rooms, and complimentary coffee and muffins, with mixed feedback on staff friendliness and room maintenance.

Woogo Central Park Apartments is located on the Upper West Side, close to the subway and Central Park, and offers apartment-style accommodations with kitchenettes. It is not a full-service hotel, so guests should not expect daily maid service or hotel-like amenities.

Wyndham Garden Hotel Times Square South has a business center, wireless internet, and work desks in rooms, and it is located near Penn Station, Times Square, and the Jacob Javits center. It also features comfortable beds, a restaurant, and a bar, with easy access to Times Square, the Theater District, and Restaurant Row.
